attributes.action: If an MP swaps political party mid-term, a by-election is mandatory in 25 days.
attributes.additional_details: Democracy and Constituents deserve the right to reaffirm their faith (or otherwise) in their MP, especially after the MP makes such a dramatic change in their personal beliefs.
attributes.background: Force an MP who changes political party, (to a different political party), mid-term to resign. Making a by-election in that MP's constituency mandatory.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
